languages.text: {n}Арджента рефлекторно вскидывает оружие, узрев гнилое нутро мутанта. Кажется, что яростное пламя в ее взгляде вот-вот испепелит мерзость не хуже огнемета.{/n}
{n}Argenta reflexively raises her weapon when she sees the mutant's rotten insides. The fiery rage in her eyes seems capable of incinerating the abomination as thoroughly as any flamer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента рефлекторно вскидывает оружие, узрев гнилое нутро мутанта. Кажется, что яростное пламя в ее взгляде вот-вот испепелит мерзость не хуже огнемета.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta levanta el arma por instinto al ver las entrañas podridas del mutante. La rabia ardiente en su mirada parece capaz de incinerar a la abominación como si se tratase de un lanzallamas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta reflexively raises her weapon when she sees the mutant's rotten insides. The fiery rage in her eyes seems capable of incinerating the abomination as thoroughly as any flamer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta levanta el arma por instinto al ver las entrañas podridas del mutante. La rabia ardiente en su mirada parece capaz de incinerar a la abominación como si se tratase de un lanzallamas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは変異体の腐った内臓を見て反射的に武器を構えた。彼女の目に宿る激しい怒りは、どんなフレイマーにも負けないほど、醜悪なものを徹底的に焼き尽くすことができるかのように見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta reflexively raises her weapon when she sees the mutant's rotten insides. The fiery rage in her eyes seems capable of incinerating the abomination as thoroughly as any flamer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは変異体の腐った内臓を見て反射的に武器を構えた。彼女の目に宿る激しい怒りは、どんなフレイマーにも負けないほど、醜悪なものを徹底的に焼き尽くすことができるかのように見えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当阿洁塔看到变种人腐烂的内脏时，她本能般地举起了武器，眼中炽热的怒火仿佛火焰喷射器的烈焰一样，渴望将眼前的可憎之物化为灰烬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta reflexively raises her weapon when she sees the mutant's rotten insides. The fiery rage in her eyes seems capable of incinerating the abomination as thoroughly as any flamer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当阿洁塔看到变种人腐烂的内脏时，她本能般地举起了武器，眼中炽热的怒火仿佛火焰喷射器的烈焰一样，渴望将眼前的可憎之物化为灰烬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta hebt reflexartig ihre Waffe, als sie das verrottete Gedärm des Mutanten sieht. Die feurige Wut in ihren Augen scheint die Abscheulichkeit ebenso gründlich verbrennen zu können wie ein Flammenwerfer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta reflexively raises her weapon when she sees the mutant's rotten insides. The fiery rage in her eyes seems capable of incinerating the abomination as thoroughly as any flamer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta hebt reflexartig ihre Waffe, als sie das verrottete Gedärm des Mutanten sieht. Die feurige Wut in ihren Augen scheint die Abscheulichkeit ebenso gründlich verbrennen zu können wie ein Flammenwerfer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Par pur réflexe, Argenta lève son arme à la vue des entrailles putrides du mutant. La fureur qui anime son regard pourrait incinérer l'abomination tout aussi bien que n'importe quel lance-flammes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta reflexively raises her weapon when she sees the mutant's rotten insides. The fiery rage in her eyes seems capable of incinerating the abomination as thoroughly as any flamer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Par pur réflexe, Argenta lève son arme à la vue des entrailles putrides du mutant. La fureur qui anime son regard pourrait incinérer l'abomination tout aussi bien que n'importe quel lance-flammes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta, mutantın çürümüş iç organlarını görmesiyle birlikte refleks olarak silahını kaldırıyor. Gözlerindeki alev alev yanan öfke, ucubeyi alevsaçan misali baştan aşağı küle çevirebilecek gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta reflexively raises her weapon when she sees the mutant's rotten insides. The fiery rage in her eyes seems capable of incinerating the abomination as thoroughly as any flamer.{/n}
